title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
OB: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The system should not throw an error message when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the table filter.
2. Enter new Date('3/2/2005') as the value.
3. Apply the filter and observe the error message being thrown.
